scripts.install-all: npm install --force --legacy-peer-deps --prefix frontend && npm install vite --force --prefix frontend && npm install --force --legacy-peer-deps --prefix backend
scripts.install-clean: rimraf frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules && npm run install-all
scripts.build: npm install vite --force --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm start --prefix backend"
